description: As we kick off Ghoulhammer 2024, we are taking a look at the articles we released in previous years – as well as unearthing some seasonally-appropriate content to get you into the spirit. Ghoulhammer covers a lot of ground – spooky game roundtables, painting guides, custom missions, and plenty more. How to Paint Everything – […]
title: Ghoulhammer Classics – Content from Spooky Seasons Past

description: We take a look at Secret Missions and Gambits and look at the stats behind how often they're picked, how often they succeed, how often that leads to wins, and how things have changed since the Q4 update.
title: Hammer of Math: Pariah Nexus Secret Missions

description: Stephanie covers the various bumps in the night you'll find as you trick or treat through the Kings of War factions.
title: Ghoulhammer: A Pannithor Halloween – Trick(ster’s Wand) or Treat?

description: A big thank you to Victrix for supplying a bag of their new Pagan Rus minis alongside a transfer sheet of Little Big Men Studio shield transfers for review. It’s not summer anymore technically but it’s always SAGA Summer in our hearts! Way back when I was getting into historicals for the first time (May […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: Victrix Rus Miniatures Review and Pagan Rus SAGA Warband

description: In this article we’re looking at how to select an appropriate colour scheme for your Bretonnian army, considerations and other fun discussions on heraldry from a real-world, lore, or just “I want something pretty” perspective.  Let’s be straight up. Bretonnia is probably one of the most daunting factions to paint, mostly because of the inheritance […]
title: Heraldry and You – A Quick Guide to Choosing a Colour Scheme for Bretonnia in the Old World

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? returns with his review of the new Kill Team Starter Set! Be goes over all the content from rules, MDF terrain, as well as the starter rules for the Space Marine and Plague Marine kill teams! Have any questions or feedback? Drop us a note in the comments […]
title: CYRAC: Kill Team Starter Set Review
